name: emp2
r2rml:
@prefix : <http://ejemplo.org/mapping/>.
@prefix rr: <http://www.w3.org/ns/r2rml#>.
@prefix ex: <http://ejemplo.org/>.
@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>.
@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>.
@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>.

:TriplesMap_emp a rr:TriplesMap;
    rr:logicalTable _:n3-0.
_:n3-0 rr:tableName "emp".
:TriplesMap_emp rr:subjectMap _:n3-1.
_:n3-1 rr:template "http://ejemplo.org/emp/{emp_no}";
    rr:class ex:Emp.
:TriplesMap_emp rr:predicateObjectMap _:n3-2.
_:n3-2 rr:predicateMap _:n3-3.
_:n3-3 rr:constant ex:apellido.
_:n3-2 rr:objectMap _:n3-4.
_:n3-4 rr:column "apellido";
    rr:datatype xsd:string.
:TriplesMap_emp rr:predicateObjectMap _:n3-5.
_:n3-5 rr:predicateMap _:n3-6.
_:n3-6 rr:constant ex:oficio.
_:n3-5 rr:objectMap _:n3-7.
_:n3-7 rr:column "oficio";
    rr:datatype xsd:string.
:TriplesMap_emp rr:predicateObjectMap _:n3-8.
_:n3-8 rr:predicateMap _:n3-9.
_:n3-9 rr:constant ex:dir.
_:n3-8 rr:objectMap _:n3-10.
_:n3-10 rr:column "dir";
    rr:datatype xsd:integer.
:TriplesMap_emp rr:predicateObjectMap _:n3-11.
_:n3-11 rr:predicateMap _:n3-12.
_:n3-12 rr:constant ex:fecha_alt.
_:n3-11 rr:objectMap _:n3-13.
_:n3-13 rr:column "fecha_alt";
    rr:datatype xsd:string.
:TriplesMap_emp rr:predicateObjectMap _:n3-14.
_:n3-14 rr:predicateMap _:n3-15.
_:n3-15 rr:constant ex:salario.
_:n3-14 rr:objectMap _:n3-16.
_:n3-16 rr:column "salario";
    rr:datatype xsd:decimal.
:TriplesMap_emp rr:predicateObjectMap _:n3-17.
_:n3-17 rr:predicateMap _:n3-18.
_:n3-18 rr:constant ex:comision.
_:n3-17 rr:objectMap _:n3-19.
_:n3-19 rr:column "comision";
    rr:datatype xsd:decimal.
:TriplesMap_emp rr:predicateObjectMap _:n3-20.
_:n3-20 rr:predicateMap _:n3-21.
_:n3-21 rr:constant ex:dept_no.
_:n3-20 rr:objectMap _:n3-22.
_:n3-22 rr:column "dept_no";
    rr:datatype xsd:integer.
